Uses of Class
com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.DataSizeException

Packages that use DataSizeException
com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface. 
com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice The standard Intelligence Analysis Platform network search service provides clients with the ability to perform network searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in. 
 

Uses of DataSizeException in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice
 

Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice that throw DataSizeException
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.networkSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
          Searches an external data source for groups of Items that together meet the assembled criteria of the nodes in a network, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
 

Uses of DataSizeException in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice
 

Subclasses of DataSizeException in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice
 class NetworkSearchMatchesTooManyNetworksException
          The exception raised when a network search operation finds more networks than the server allows.
 class NodeDataSizeException
          The exception raised when a network search request cannot be processed because one of the NetworkSearchNodes involves more data than the server allows.
 class NodeMatchesTooManyItemsException
          The exception raised when a node in a network search operation finds more results than the server allows.
 class NodeUsesTooLargeSetException
          The exception raised when a network search request cannot be processed because one of the NetworkSearchNodes references a set that is larger than the server allows.
